Has anyone else been noticing mass discrepancies? I've had problems a number of times now where I took a big part and downscaled it substantially. It looks like it scaled normally in the VAB, but when I go to launch the ship--or exit the VAB and re-enter--the mass of the part goes back up to its original value, despite the size of the model still being downscaled. I've seen this happen on at least two vanilla engine parts so far; not sure what else might be exhibiting it.

I'm having some issues with tweakscale and AIES that perhaps y'all could help me with... it seems that when I use a scaled AIES probe core as my root part, the part resizes to its default size once i switch to another craft or change scenes.

Here's my craft during ascent

Here's my craft after circularization and switching back to the Space Center
